description: This stand adapts the Evoc's Bike Travel Case for a road or tri ride. It holds the front fork and rear drop to keep the frame stable in transit.Made of aluminum tubing.Quick-release skewers secure front fork and rear drop out.Infinitely variable length adjustment and 3-step height adjustment.Dimensions are 125 x 25 x 15cm.Note: Not for use with the Evoc Road Bike adapter.
name: EVOC Road Bike Aluminium Stand
